Package xyz.jeremynoesen.pseudo3d.scene.render

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
xyz.jeremynoesen.pseudo3d.scene.render.Camera
public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
camera used to determine where to render a scene

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Camera()
    creates a new default camera
    Camera​(Camera camera)
    copies a camera to a new one
    Camera​(Vector position, Vector offset, float sensorSize, float fieldOfView, float viewDistance, float zoom, float rotation)
    constructs a new camera with set position, sensor res, and field of view

  • Constructor Details

    • Camera

      public Camera()
      creates a new default camera

    • Camera

      public Camera​(Vector position, Vector offset, float sensorSize, float fieldOfView, float viewDistance, float zoom, float rotation)
      constructs a new camera with set position, sensor res, and field of view
      Parameters:
      position - camera position in scene
      sensorSize - camera sensor size
      fieldOfView - field of view in degrees
      viewDistance - z distance camera is able to see in grid units
      zoom - camera zoom, scales render
      rotation - rotation of camera in degrees
      offset - position of camera in window

    • Camera

      public Camera​(Camera camera)
      copies a camera to a new one
      Parameters:
      camera - camera to copy
